actionTemplate.title: Crescent Brow
steps: Use a more visible curve with a rounded arch placed slightly forward
Draw a curved lower line and connect into a slender tail
Follow the curve on the top edge for a smooth silhouette
Blur the front; lightly deepen the arch to show the curve
Blend edges so the arc doesn't look harsh

rationaleTemplate: A rounded curve reads sweet and approachable.
Great for soft makeup without a sharp, strong vibe.
